messages.subject: New group created
messages.msgSnippet: Hi everyone! Just wanted to let everyone know that I ve formed a new group for discussion of the Edo period and of the Tokugawa clan, which can be found at:
messages.messageBody:
Hi everyone!

Just wanted to let everyone know that I've formed a new group for discussion
of the Edo period and of the Tokugawa clan, which can be found at:

http://groups.yahoo.com/group/edojidai/

I'd be honored if you could check it out!

--Masayoshi

(a.k.a. Tokugawa Hirotada-- on the new list, anyway)
